actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To clarify the authority for use of snowmachines in certain areas of Denali National Park and Preserve, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that specified portions of Denali National Park and Preserve shall not be considered a conservation system unit for the purposes of special access by snowmachines pursuant to the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act or implementing regulations.Revokes specified agency actions relating to the closure of portions of the Park and Preserve to snowmachine use.

titles.title: To clarify the authority for use of snowmachines in certain areas of Denali National Park and Preserve, and for other purposes.
